text:
OpenMail | Los Angeles(Venice), CA | Full-time, ONSITE, VISA welcome

OpenMail is a thriving adtech startup with a team of 30, evenly split between engineering and business development. We’re addicted to data and optimization, striving every day to pick apart our partners’ problems and build better solutions. We care deeply about company culture and individual development. Plus our office is two blocks from Venice beach.

Technical Project Manager- an experienced technical project manager who can hit the ground running. Engineering background strongly preferred

Backend Engineer- Python/Flask environment, AWS, SQL

Ops Engineer- Linux, AWS background

Frontend Engineer- HTML/CSS, javascript, rapid prototyping

Product Manager- adtech product experience highly preferred

http://www.openmail.com/careers
